Description:
Honeywell Training Solutions is hiring a software engineer for its Flight Simulator Support team.  The Flight Simulator Support team provides full service solutions for training device manufacturers.  These solutions include providing data, support, and avionics rehost packages.  The types of avionics software that are rehosted include:
EPIC displays and FMS, also known as EASE
Air Transport FMS, including Pegasus and Legacy (SDP185, AMD29k, and HI29k-II) in Pascal, ADA, and C
MKV and MKV-A EGPWS
Future: nFMS for Airbus, TxD, and Anthem
The Flight Simulator Support team requires a software engineer that is able to tackle multiple projects in different software languages and has an understanding of various avionics platforms.   The ideal candidate has experience with the following tools
-          Microsoft Windows programming
-          Visual Studio 6.0, 2005, 2017
-          ITEG
-          DSC, immsim, Execsim
-          Languages including ADA, C, C++
-          ED247A
-          Devproc, and LinuxJOB ID: HRD208345
